name: Super Mama World
description:
This is a small 3D platformer featuring Mama (from Don't Call Me Mama But Yes I Am Your Mama). It was made as a way to say thank you and look back on Kyle Bosman's four years with Easy Allies, specifically his late night solo streams.

Gameplay wise, it is inspired heavily by games like Super Mario 64 and Banjo-Kazooie, some of my favorite games and platformers from when I was a kid. There's also an inventory system that was designed specifically to work like the one from Resident Evil 4. 

This does contain some copyrighted music and images from other games, so it is not downloadable and there will never be a way to support this project financially. I am looking to take that stuff out so that it can be made public, hopefully I'll find the time to do that soon. In the meantime, if you're interested, please check out the brief walkthrough video linked on this page.

**Known Issue: The game will every once in a while/rarely run into a fatal error and crash when launched. It seems to maybe be an engine or DirectX issue. Relaunching fixes it, at least for me (unknown if permanently or not).
